name: Roll Switch - Space
description:
In Roll Switch – Space you control a 3D ball over platforms in space with the only objective to reach the finish. And to make it more fun we’ve added a movement switching mechanic which will change your movement controls overtime. Sometimes it can be a little bit rage-y.

Enjoy 70 beautiful crafted levels build in space over planet Earth that will keep you entertained all the way! From easier to hard those levels are designed to be a test for your nerves, self-control, quick-thinking and reflexes!

Please be advised that “Roll Switch – Space” may awake hidden rage feelings. PLEASE try to keep those under control – this ability will help you tremendously in your life!

Features:

  • Beautiful space design
  • Space 3D ball with movement switching mechanic
  • One-touch control movement
  • 70 unique levels
  • Peaceful background space music

If you like the game consider subscribing to be the first to know when there are new cool stuffs!
